headline: Occidental Petroleum Has Achieved 90% of This Crucial Goal. Time to Buy the Oil Stock?
summary: The oil industry is currently undergoing a massive consolidation wave.  Sector leader ExxonMobil kicked things off by acquiring Pioneer Natural Resources in a more than $60 billion deal.  Several other oil companies also struck deals to acquire smaller rivals, including Occidental Petroleum (NYSE: OXY), which bought CrownRock in a $12 billion deal.
